scripts.docker:run:dev: yarn run docker:build:dev && docker run -it --rm -v ${PWD}:/app -v /app/node_modules -p 3000:3000 -e CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true seakers-frontend:dev
scripts.docker:run:prod: yarn run docker:build:prod && docker run -it --rm -v ${PWD}:/app -v /app/node_modules -v /app/.next -p 3000:3000 -e CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true seakers-frontend:prod
